title: AI Workflow Proposal
description: A comprehensive proposal for implementing AI workflows in knowledge management
author: Sitruna Research Team

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: This document outlines a proposed workflow for integrating AI capabilities into the Sitruna knowledge management system. The workflow is designed to enhance content discovery, automate routine tasks, and provide intelligent insights based on the knowledge graph.

sections.title: Objectives
sections.content:
The primary objectives of this AI integration are:

1. Reduce time spent on manual knowledge management tasks
2. Improve discovery of relevant information across silos
3. Enhance the value of existing knowledge through intelligent connections
4. Provide personalized knowledge experiences based on user profiles and behavior

sections.title: Proposed Architecture
sections.content:
The AI workflow architecture consists of several interconnected components:

- **Content Ingestion Layer**: Processes and normalizes content from various sources
- **AI Processing Pipeline**: Applies NLP, ML, and other AI techniques to extract insights
- **Knowledge Graph Enhancement**: Automatically discovers and creates relationships
- **User Interface Layer**: Presents AI-enhanced information in an intuitive way

sections.title: Implementation Phases
sections.content:
The implementation will proceed in three phases:

1. **Foundation Phase**: Set up basic infrastructure and content processing
2. **Enhancement Phase**: Implement core AI capabilities and integration points
3. **Optimization Phase**: Refine algorithms, add advanced features, optimize performance

sections.title: Technologies
sections.content:
The proposed solution leverages the following technologies:

- **Core AI**: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers
- **Data Processing**: Apache Spark, Airflow
- **Knowledge Graph**: Neo4j, GraphQL
- **APIs and Integration**: FastAPI, gRPC
- **User Interface**: React, D3.js
